summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6742 for the improvement of the alley in Block 10, Plat of Dumar, Division No. 2, being the alley between 18th Avenue Southwest and 17th Avenue Southwest from Southwest Kenyon Street to Southwest Holden Street, by paving, etc., and levying and assessing the amounts thereof upon the property within the district; and establishing a local improvement fund.
